DOC.brief_summary: A trial compare Treatment usual Motivational Interviewing focus treatment 'Small Changes ' programme .
DOC.brief_title: Small Changes One Year Protocol Weight Management
DOC.detailed_description: A quasi-experimental design . With one arm focus 'treatment usual ' Motivational Interviewing . Subjects randomly assign treat two separate cohort one Running October 2011-October 2012 use Treatment usual separate cohort run October 2012 October -2013 use motivational interviewing approach treatment .
DOC.criteria: Body Mass index equal great 30 kgm2
